MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the CH8 postcode area of Holywell, affecting properties in Bryn Y Felin and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8:52AM.  In order to complete repairs safely, engineers on site needed to isolate the power to other properties and we expect the power to be restored between 4PM and 8PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2.19PM on 24th October 2020
